jvx.curve

Class PgFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • jv.object.PsObject
      • jv.project.PgGeometry
        • jv.geom.PgPointSet
          • jv.geom.PgPolygon
            • jvx.curve.PgFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, PsUpdateIf, PgGeometryIf

    public class PgFunction
extends PgPolygon
    A function graph over an interval on the real axis. The function may be given as string and interactively edited.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public boolean update(java.lang.Object event)
        Update the class whenever a child has changed. Method is usually invoked from the children.
        Specified by:
        update in interface PsUpdateIf
        Overrides:
        update in class PgPolygon
        Parameters:
        event - carries a lot of information
        Returns:
        true if event has been handled, otherwise false

      • computeCurve

        public boolean computeCurve()

      • setFunction

        public boolean setFunction(PuFunction aFun)
        Set coordinate functions which may be interactively edited in the control panel. Number of functions must be equal to the vertex dimension of this surface.
